body:
PostgreSQL auto-reconnect functionality has been broken at least twice in different ways. Test coverage was added with the fix in https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/6654 with corrections in https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/7292 and https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/7294.

Back-porting the the test coverage from those pull requests should help prevent future breakages of this functionality.

Note that the bug fixed in https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/6654 has never existed in Rails 3.2.x, but the one fixed in https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/6477 did exist in earlier 3.2.x patch versions.
